name: Velora
description: Velora is a crosschain, intent-centric protocol that enables traders and dApps to access decentralized liquidity and execute trades at the best possible price â€” all in a gasless, MEV-protected, and seamless way. Velora abstracts complexity and fragmentation by allowing users to express what they want to achieve and handles execution across chains and liquidity sources. This shift unlocks a radically simpler and more secure user experience, positioning Velora at the forefront of DeFi's intent-based future.
